description: Enable the creation, management, and presentation of short courses and training programs

userStories.title: Create Program Schema
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to create the database schema for programs so that program data can be stored
acceptanceCriteria: Program table with fields: id, title_ar, title_en, description_ar, description_en, outcomes, duration, format, price, early_bird_price, corporate_price, status, created_at, updated_at
userStories.notes: Schema complete. Added earlyBirdPrice, corporatePrice, certificateEnabled, certificateAttendanceThreshold. Created ProgramModule and Session tables. Instructor assignment simplified to cohort-level only (more practical than M:N at program level).

userStories.title: Create Program Admin Form
userStories.description: As a Program Manager, I want a form to create new programs so that I can add offerings to the catalog
acceptanceCriteria: Form with fields: title (AR/EN), description (AR/EN), outcomes, duration, format
userStories.notes: Form complete with all fields including pricing tiers and certificate settings. Rich text editor deferred as nice-to-have (textarea sufficient for MVP).
recommendations: Consider Tiptap integration for enhanced description editing (future enhancement)

userStories.title: Set Program Pricing
userStories.description: As a Program Manager, I want to set pricing tiers so that different rates apply for individuals and corporates
acceptanceCriteria: Price input for regular, early-bird, and corporate rates
userStories.notes: Pricing tiers fully implemented. Form includes regular price, early bird price, and corporate price fields with proper validation.

userStories.title: Assign Instructor to Program
userStories.description: As a Program Manager, I want to assign instructors to a program so that learners know who will teach
userStories.notes: Instructor assignment moved to cohort level (more practical). Instructors are assigned when creating cohorts, not at program level. This allows different instructors for different cohorts of the same program.

userStories.title: Define Curriculum Structure
userStories.description: As a Program Manager, I want to define modules and sessions so that the curriculum is clear
acceptanceCriteria: Each module has title (AR/EN) and duration
Sessions can be added within modules
userStories.notes: Fully implemented. Backend CRUD APIs complete. Admin curriculum builder UI integrated into program management with add/edit/delete for modules and sessions. Curriculum displays on public program detail page.
recommendations: Consider adding drag-and-drop reordering UI (backend API already supports it)

userStories.title: Set Certificate Eligibility Criteria
userStories.description: As a Program Manager, I want to define certificate eligibility so that completion rules are clear
userStories.notes: Certificate settings fully implemented. Admin form includes certificate enabled toggle and attendance threshold slider (0-100%). Stored in database and used by certificate generation logic.

userStories.title: Program Status Lifecycle
userStories.description: As a Program Manager, I want to publish/unpublish programs so that I control catalog visibility
acceptanceCriteria: Only Published programs appear in public catalog
userStories.notes: Status lifecycle fully functional. Admin table now has status dropdown (Draft/Published/Archived) that updates in real-time. Only published programs appear in public catalog.

userStories.title: Clone Existing Program
userStories.description: As a Program Manager, I want to clone a program so that I can create variations quickly
acceptanceCriteria: Clone button on program detail page
Creates copy with (Copy) appended to title
New program starts in Draft status
userStories.notes: Clone functionality complete. Admin table has clone button that creates deep copy of program including all modules and sessions. Cloned program starts in Draft status with '(Copy)' appended to title.

userStories.title: Public Catalog Page
userStories.description: As a learner, I want to browse the catalog so that I can discover available programs
acceptanceCriteria: Program card shows: title, brief description, price, duration
Arabic RTL layout when AR selected
userStories.notes: Implemented. Grid view, RTL support verified.

userStories.title: Program Detail Page
userStories.description: As a learner, I want to view program details so that I can decide whether to enroll
userStories.notes: Program detail page complete with curriculum display. Shows modules and sessions in expandable format with duration information. Instructor shown at cohort level.

userStories.title: Catalog Search and Filter
userStories.description: As a learner, I want to search and filter programs so that I can find relevant offerings
userStories.notes: Search and filter fully functional. Added delivery mode filter (All/Online/In-Person/Hybrid) to complement existing search, category, and price filters.
